Title: Lammbock
Actors: Lucas Gregorowicz, Moritz Bleibtreu, Marie Zielcke, Julian Weigend
Plot: German louts Stefan and Kai run a pizzeria, but it's mainly a front for their more lucrative self-grown cannabis trade, allowing them to deliver at home. When the plants get sick, the dealers bring in pest control expert Achim, but that changes everything.
